title: MaMeeFarm AML PoW/RWA Schema
description: Machine-readable specification for AML-compliant Proof-of-Work Real-World Assets.

proof_id.description: Unique ID of the Proof-of-Work event.

timestamp.description: Exact creation time of the PoW event.

pow_type.description: Type of physical activity that generated the value.

asset_linked.description: Farm asset or output associated with this Proof event.

ipfs_cid.description: IPFS CID pointing to evidence files (image, video, log).

ml_verifiable_hash.description: Hash that enables AI and machine verification.
